TOURISM

TOURISM IN AFRICA

Are you planing a trip to some where in African? Are you caught between which Country to visit? Then this is the answer you have been waiting for. There are many places in Africa, that one should think of when planing to travel around the world. These tour sites are know for their distinct impression they have on their visitors. Place have a particular way of making people feel the sensation and adventure of being there. Often, people have a certain perceptions about African. Forgeting all the perceptions, African Countries have a lot of spectacular Landscape, Arts, Culture and people that everyone must have the chance to interact with.

I will now take you through some of the most exotic and marvelous places in African.

COUNTRIES AND THE PLACE TO VISIT

  • NAMIBIA
  • SOUTH AFRICA
  • BOTSWANA
  • GHANA

NAMIBIA

Namibia is one of the most beautiful places to look at when considering a country to tour in Africa. Some of the tour sites you can visit and be content with are: Desert Explorers, Quiver Tree Forest & Giants Playground, Etosha National Park, Skeleton Coast National Park and many others. Most of the people who visit Namibia have nothing but good memories of the arts, culture and serenity of the places they visit. If you are a fan of marine animals, then the Cape Cross Seal Reserve is surely a place to visit. Below are some of the beautiful sites in Namibia.

Read more about tourism in Namibia

SOUTH AFRICA

When we talk about tourism in Africa, South Africa is one of the countries enriched with a lot of tourist sites. Most people visit South Africa to have a feel of the culture of the people and enjoy themselves. Talking about places to visit, there are a lot of interesting places to tour and have an adventure of your life. Some of the places are: Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves in Africa and is inhabited with different types of animals to enjoy the Safari. Cape town is an exciting site to behold, it is surrounded with a lot of beaches, the famous Iconic Table Mountain. You can also visit the Drakenberg Mountains, the Cape Wine Lands and many others.

Read more about tourism in South Africa

BOTSWANA

A trip to Botswana is one that you will never regret taking. Botswana is one of the African countries where people visit a lot and a journey to Botswana will be worth your time. The interesting sites range from wildlife to landscape to culture and atmosphere. There are places like: Kalahari Desert, Chobe National Park, Okavango Delta and the Tuli Block which are known for the wildlife experience they provide. Places like Tsodilo Hills and Nxai Pan National Park show us the beauty of landscape and arts. Botswana is full of kind and friendly people who will make your time there memorable.

Read more about tourism in Botswana

GHANA

When we talk of a country to visit in Africa, Ghana is surely a place to experience. Ghana is one of the most peaceful countries which is inhabited by kind and caring people. Different types of culture are portrayed and the sites are just amazing to miss. Some of the places to visit while in Ghana are: Kakum national park, Mole National Park, Busua Beach, Nzulezu, Cape Coast Castle and many others. A trip to Ghana will make you yearn for more to the extent that you will visit again.

Read more about tourism in Ghana

So here are some countries and places to visit when planning a trip to Africa. One thing you must always remember is, “ to enjoy the Journey, you must get to know the people and they will show you the best time of your life.”
